title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
description: Close all saved does not close the file even if no changes have been made.
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' option from the file menu does not close the file.
EB: The 'Close All Saved' option should close the file when no changes have been made.
SR:
1. Open the application with build 20020508 and the latest UI code.
2. Create a new file named f1.txt.
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
